column4: what's the minimum requirements (CPU/RAM) for ubuntu on a ppc? same as PC?
It should run fine on anything G3 233 with probably 128 ram ABSOLUTE mimimum; 256 nice 512Mb comfortable.
I've run it on an old-word G3/233 with 192 mb just fine.
If you have less than 128Mb ram, do a 'server' install, then add a lightweight wm like *box
